pages.title: Reskillable: General
pages.text: This modpack uses a lot of reskillable's capabilities to lock some content and abilities behind leveling skills. $(br)To get started, open your inventory and click the odd looking badge thing. Here you can level up skills and pick out traits once you have enough skills points and level.$(br) Helpful tip: Join a team! Skill levels and achievements are shared across teams.

pages.title: Skills - Locks
pages.text: Some items and tools are locked behind skills levels. Generally you can see any locks by hovering over an item, but on the next few page you'll find lists of some major ones.

pages.title: Skills - Defense
pages.text: $(li) Armor values above 5 (actually 2.5 armor icons): Defense 3 $(li) 10 Armor: Defense 7 $(li) 20 Armor: Defense 15

pages.title: Skills - Attack
pages.text: $(li) Weapons that deal 6 or more damage: Attack 5 $(li) 10 or more damage: Attack 12 $(li) 100 or more damage: Attack 30

pages.title: Skills - Mine/Gather
pages.text: $(li) Tools that have a mining level of an Iron Pickaxe or higher, and matching blocks: Mining and Gathering 7 $(li) Diamond Pickaxe or higher: Mining and Gathering 12 $(li) Cobalt or higher: Mining and Gathering 17 $(li) 5 or higher (mostly TAIGA blocks/tools): Mining and Gathering 22
